sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Button,Row,Col,Input} from 'antd'; const Zero = () => { React.useEffect(()=>{ if(window.innerWidth>700) setVisible(false) }) const [s,sets] =React.useState(0) const [e,sete] =React.useState(100) const [r,setr]=React.useState() const setS= (e) => { sets(Number(e.target.value)) calculate() } const setE= (e) => { sete(Number(e.target.value)) calculate() } const calculate = () => { setr(e -s) } const click = () => { calculate(); } return(
0-X % Conversion
Calculation
Start Value setS(e)}> End value setE(e)}>
{r!==undefined &&
RESULT
0% {s} 25% {(r/4 +Number(s))} 50% {(r/2 +Number(s))} 75% {(r)*3/4 + Number(s)} 100% {e}
}
description
This tool is used to calculate 0% , 25% , 50% , 75% ,and 100% of range between two numbers.
) } export default Zero;
